song.title: Fading Like a Rose
song.info: Sample texts: tune by: croon/no limits r8-dshaker1 r8-dshaker2 r8-csidstk2 r8-apdal h1 U20-Fanta.Bell d70-bass2 u20-prelusion.maj1 u20-prelusion.min1 u20-prelusion.sus2 u20-prelusion.sus4 U20-E.Guitar1(Short) U20-(mx)Scrt/fb. CD.AHA-Dr.Rimshot CD.EJ-Dr.snare(Kit) CD.EJ-Dr.kick(Kit) r8-(mx)kickchrs this song is dedicated to my father who died 16/4-91
